      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Sodium carbonate and sulphuric acid reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion des Natriumkarbonats und der 
Schwefelsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de carbonate de sodium et d'acide 
sulfurique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação do carbonato de sodium e do ácido 
sulfúrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione del carbonato di sodio e dell'acido 
solforico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση ανθρακικού άλατος νατρίου και θειικού 
οξέος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción del carbonato de sodio y del ácido 
sulfúrico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This word equation shows the correct way to describe the chemical reaction between sodium carbonate and sulphuric acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium carbonate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphuric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">word equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Wortgleichung zeigt die korrekte Methode, 
die chemische Reaktion zwischen Natriumkarbonat und Schwefelsäure zu 
beschreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette équation de mot montre la voie correcte de
décrire la réaction chimique entre le carbonate de sodium et l'acide
sulfurique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta equação da palavra mostra a maneira 
correta descrever a reação química entre o carbonato de sodium e o 
ácido sulfúrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa equazione di parola mostra il modo 
corretto descrivere la reazione chimica fra il carbonato di sodio e 
l'acido solforico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η εξίσωση λέξης εμφανίζει σωστό τρόπο να 
περιγραφεί η χημική αντίδραση μεταξύ του ανθρακικού άλατος 
νατρίου και του θειικού οξέος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ecuación de la palabra muestra la manera 
correcta de describir la reacción química entre el carbonato de 
sodio y el ácido sulfúrico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
